values: 错过；未击中；未达到；迟到；未抓住；未得到；遗漏；忽略；想念；怀念；思念；避免；躲避；避开（不愉快的事）；不做；不在；发现…不见；发觉丢失；未能参与；不理解；不懂；未觉察
失误；未击中目标；漏过；遗漏；失策；失败；失利；错过的机会；未得到的东西；（Miss）小姐；女士；年轻未婚女子

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指反映东西放错或故意放错地方。
最普通用词，侧重遗失了，难以找回来。
着重发觉某人或某物不见的瞬间，也可作思念解。

word_group.brief_definition: 错过, 错失, 漏掉
错失要点；没抓住重点；漏掉了重点
差之毫厘, 谬以千里
word_group.phrase: a miss is as good as a mile

word_group.brief_definition: 侥幸避开的相撞；几乎命中的炸弹；靠近弹；近距脱靶；侥幸避过的事物；侥幸脱险；死里逃生；几乎成功的事；功亏一篑的事
跳动（似乎）暂停；犹豫；踌躇
未取得进入后两场比赛的资格
我想你；思念你；我想念你
不论成功与否；命中或错过；成功或失手
打击和错过；撞击和思念；漫无目标地

bilingual.target: 你不应该错过这个电视节目。

bilingual.source: Kareem doesn't miss swimming in the lake.
bilingual.target: 卡里姆不想错过在湖里游泳。

bilingual.source: They miss school, so get bad exam results.
bilingual.target: 他们错过了上学，所以考试成绩不好。

bilingual.source: We don't want to miss the bus, so we must hurry.
bilingual.target: 我们不想错过公交车，所以我们必须赶快。

bilingual.source: You won't want to miss the view of the sun that is setting on the sea!
bilingual.target: 你不会想错过海上落日的景色！

bilingual.source: Oh! But if you don't go to the party, you will miss all the fun!
bilingual.target: 哦！但是如果你不去派对，你会错过所有的乐趣！

bilingual.source: Well, if you miss the bus you'll get a detention for being late.
bilingual.target: 好吧，如果你错过校车，你会因为迟到而被留校。

bilingual.source: Starring Anne Hathaway, it is definitely a movie you should not miss!
bilingual.target: 由安妮·海瑟薇主演，这绝对是一部你不应该错过的电影！

bilingual.source: Aim for the highest cloud, so that if you miss it, you will hit a lofty mountain.
bilingual.target: 瞄准最高的云彩，这样如果你错过了它，你会撞上一座高山。

list.abstract: 韩懿莹（游戏ID：七芯海棠、上路不MISS），1989年5月21日出生于四川省内江市，毕业于海南大学，中国内地电竞女选手、解说、主持人，被称之为中国全能女解说。 2007年，开始成为电子竞技运动员，2007年至2012年是《魔兽争霸Ⅲ》电竞选手，曾获得过WCG2008广州赛区魔兽女子组冠军、第三届国际女子邀请赛冠军、中俄欧国际女子线上公开赛冠军等荣誉。于2012年转为《星际争霸Ⅱ》电竞选手，曾获得ZOWIE DIVINA中国星际2女王赛冠军。2010年至2015年，开始从事游戏解说，主要从事《魔兽争霸》《星际争霸》《DOTA》《英雄联盟》等游戏解说。2016年2月，签约虎牙直播。2019年7月，参加的脱口秀《酒后探真言》播出。 2024年4月19日，参演的综艺节目《乘风2024》定档在芒果TV播出。
诗幂指刘诗诗和杨幂，是广泛的CP群体的一员，而诗幂Fans的昵称即为：MISS。

yingyinNormal.en: You should go. You're gonna miss your flight.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你该出发了，快错过航班了。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, you don't have to miss any of it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道，你不会每个都错过的。

yingyinNormal.en: If they miss them, they would lose out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他们错过了期限，他们会有所损失。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on Pedro, we don't want to miss the bus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快点，佩德罗，我们不要错过上车的时间。

yingyinNormal.en: What are you doing here? You're gonna miss your race.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还呆在这里干什么？你会错过你的比赛的

yingyinNormal.en: I understand your envy. This is a can't-miss symposium.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我很理解你会嫉妒，这是绝不能错过的研讨会。

yingyinNormal.en: I missed, what, the first time he rolled over, the first time he crawled. What else did I miss?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我错过他第一次翻身，他第一次爬，我还错过了什么？

yingyinNormal.en: I was devastated to miss Alex's graduation, until I realized I didn't have to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 错过艾丽克斯的毕业典礼让我好难受，但后来我意识到我不需要错过。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, we wouldn't want him to miss that race of his.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可不想让他错过那个比赛。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't believe this. I miss the first time of everything.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真不敢相信，我错过每个第一次了。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't want you to miss all the things that someone else could give you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不希望你错过别人能给你的一切。

yingyinNormal.en: I wouldn't miss it. Is it me, or did we just patch a tire?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会错过的。是我错觉，还是我们补好了一个轮胎？

yingyinNormal.en: Quick, George, it's bedtime. We don't want to miss the Tooth Fairy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 快点，乔治，该睡觉了，我们可不想错过牙仙子。

yingyinNormal.en: A mollusca. Very interesting. Come on Pedro, or you'll miss the bus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 软体动物。很有意思。快点，佩德罗，你要错过巴士了。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't mind. I'll cancel them. I would never miss my secretary's birthday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不介意，我可以取消，我不想错过我秘书的生日。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, I don't see why I should have to miss out on the coaching training just because I'm a woman.
yingyinNormal.zh: 只因我是个女人，我就得错过教练训练？

yingyinNormal.en: Helping you miss practice doesn't make her very nice. Not in my book. Or your team's.
yingyinNormal.zh: 害你错过训练是她不好，我跟球队都这么认为。

yingyinNormal.en: Hi, baby. Hi, baby. Did I miss putting them down? Just by an hour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 亲爱的。我错过哄他们睡觉了吗？也就晚了一小时。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Flight 421, Paris. I don't see it. Do you see it? No. Did we miss it?
yingyinNormal.zh: 421航班，巴黎找不到，你呢？我也找不着。错过了？

yingyinNormal.en: We can celebrate the holidays, because they're willing to miss their own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们能够庆祝这些节日因为他们愿意错过他们自己的度假。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 失踪的；下落不明的；找不到的；缺少的；缺掉的；不在的；缺席的

word_family.mean: v. 未击中；未够到；未接触到；发觉遗失；发觉…不在；想念；怀念；漏掉；惦念；避开

examination_example.sentence: That <highlight>misses</highlight> the way the surveillance economy works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那忽略了监察经济的运作方式。

examination_example.sentence: It measures things that do not matter and <highlight>misses</highlight> things that do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它衡量的是无关紧要的事情，而忽略了重要的事情。

examination_example.sentence: But thinking what nobody else has thought and telling others what they have <highlight>missed</highlight> may not change their views.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，想别人没有想过的事，然后告诉他们忽略掉的事，可能不会改变他们的看法。

examination_example.sentence: Recruiting more first-generation students has <highlight>missed</highlight> its original purpose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 招募更多的第一代学生失去了其最初的目的。

sense_info_list.en: feel regret or sadness at no longer being able to enjoy the presence of, do or have

examination_example.sentence: The USPS starts to <highlight>miss</highlight> its good old days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国邮政局开始怀念过去的美好时光。

examination_example.sentence: John Hagel says Brynjolfsson and McAfee <highlight>miss</highlight> the reason why these jobs are so vulnerable to technology in the first place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: John Hagel说，Brynjolfsson和McAfee没有理解这些工作从一开始就如此容易受到技术影响的原因。

sense_info_list.en: fail to attend an event or activity; be absent
a girl or young woman, especially one regarded as silly or headstrong
fail to hit, reach, or come into contact with

exam_freq_info.chinese: 错过; 没赶上; 缺席; 丢失

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: not be able to experience or fail to take advantage of an opportunity or chance

examination_example.sentence: You must have choices to have that fear of <highlight>missing</highlight> out on better options.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你必须有多个选择才会害怕错过更好的选择。

sense_info_list.en: a girl or young woman, especially one regarded as silly or headstrong
fail to attend an event or activity; be absent
sense_info_list.zh: 错过; 没赶上; 缺席; 丢失

sense_info_list.en: feel regret or sadness at no longer being able to enjoy the presence of, do or have

examination_example.sentence: I don't <highlight>miss</highlight> having managers who deliver blunt, harsh feedback in the name of efficiency.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不怀念那些以效率为名提供生硬、苛刻反馈的经理。

examination_example.sentence: But here's a crucial point most people <highlight>miss</highlight>: People also repeat bad ideas when they complain about them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是这里有一个大多数人都忽略的关键点:当人们抱怨不好的想法时，他们也会重复这些想法。

sense_info_list.en: pass by without touching; chance not to hit

word_usage.usage: miss和lose都有“迷失”的含义，但在lose one's way固定词组中lose不能换用成miss。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词, 侧重遗失了, 难以找回来。
指反映东西放错或故意放错地方。
着重发觉某人或某物不见的瞬间, 也可作思念解。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 错过; 没赶上; 缺席; 丢失

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 失踪的；下落不明的；找不到的；缺少的；缺掉的；不在的；缺席的

word_family.mean: v. 未击中；未够到；未接触到；发觉遗失；发觉…不在；想念；怀念；漏掉；惦念；避开

sense_info_list.en: fail to attend an event or activity; be absent
sense_info_list.zh: 错过; 没赶上; 缺席; 丢失

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>missing</highlight> out of main meals leads to the habit of snacking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 错过正餐会导致吃零食的习惯。

examination_example.sentence: I realized how much had been <highlight>missing</highlight> in my textbooks as I grew up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着我的成长，我意识到我的课本里少了多少东西。

examination_example.sentence: He was heartbroken after realizing he'd <highlight>missed</highlight> his high school graduation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在意识到自己错过了高中毕业典礼后，他感到心碎。

sense_info_list.en: not be able to experience or fail to take advantage of an opportunity or chance

examination_example.sentence: But other studies using the same technique have shown there's sometimes no penalty to a near <highlight>miss</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但其他使用相同技术的研究表明，有时擦肩而过不会受到惩罚。

examination_example.sentence: Students who just <highlight>miss</highlight> getting into top high schools or universities do just as well later in life as those who just manage to get accepted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 错过进入顶尖高中或大学的学生在以后的生活中表现得与那些刚刚被录取的学生一样好。

examination_example.sentence: These scientists, for reasons that are mostly arbitrary, either just <highlight>missed</highlight> getting a research grant or just barely made it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些科学家，由于一些武断的原因，要么没有获得研究资助，要么勉强获得资助。

sense_info_list.en: a girl or young woman; especially one regarded as silly or headstrong

examination_example.sentence: I'm sorry to hear that, <highlight>Miss</highlight> Seimon.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很遗憾，谢蒙小姐。

examination_example.sentence: Okay, <highlight>Miss</highlight> Bright.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好的，布莱特小姐。

sense_info_list.en: feel regret or sadness at no longer being able to enjoy the presence of; do or have

examination_example.sentence: I looked at her and said "I <highlight>missed</highlight> my graduation."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我看着她说：“我怀念我的毕业典礼。”

word_usage.usage: miss和lose都有“迷失”的含义，但在lose one's way固定词组中lose不能换用成miss。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词，侧重遗失了，难以找回来。
指反映东西放错或故意放错地方。
着重发觉某人或某物不见的瞬间，也可作思念解。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 错过; 没赶上; 缺席

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 失踪的；下落不明的；找不到的；缺少的；缺掉的；不在的；缺席的

word_family.mean: v. 未击中；未够到；未接触到；发觉遗失；发觉…不在；想念；怀念；漏掉；惦念；避开

sense_info_list.en: fail to attend an event or activity; be absent
sense_info_list.zh: 错过; 没赶上; 缺席

examination_example.sentence: So it's important to first find out the words you <highlight>miss</highlight> pronounce.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因此，首先找出你没有发音的单词是很重要的。

examination_example.sentence: After a short way, the farmer stopped and pointed at a weed which we <highlight>missed</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 走了一小段路后，农夫停下脚步，指着我们错过的一片杂草。

examination_example.sentence: You know I can't <highlight>miss</highlight> it!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你知道我不会错过的！

sense_info_list.en: a girl or young woman, especially one regarded as silly or headstrong

examination_example.sentence: I'd love to, <highlight>Miss</highlight> Wilson, but I've got a pretty tight schedule today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我很想去，Wilson小姐，但我今天的日程安排得很紧。

sense_info_list.en: feel regret or sadness at no longer being able to enjoy the presence of, do or have

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Miss</highlight> their mom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 想念他们的妈妈。

examination_example.sentence: Now I am living in a city, but I <highlight>miss</highlight> my home in the countryside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我住在城市，但是我想念我在农村的家。

word_usage.usage: miss作“错过”讲时，可接动名词，不接不定式：I missed attending the meeting last night. 昨天晚上我未能参加会议。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词，侧重遗失了，难以找回来。
指反映东西放错或故意放错地方。
着重发觉某人或某物不见的瞬间，也可作思念解。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 错过; 没赶上; 缺席; 丢失

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 失踪的；下落不明的；找不到的；缺少的；缺掉的；不在的；缺席的

word_family.mean: v. 未击中；未够到；未接触到；发觉遗失；发觉…不在；想念；怀念；漏掉；惦念；避开

sense_info_list.en: a girl or young woman, especially one regarded as silly or headstrong

examination_example.sentence: I hope I will go to a high school with teachers as good as <highlight>Miss</highlight> Chan．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我希望我能进入一所能够有像陈女士一样好的老师的高中。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Miss</highlight> Brown tells us to remember that the more careful we are, the fewer mistakes we will make.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 布朗女士告诉我们要记住，我们越小心，犯的错误就越少。

examination_example.sentence: I moved to another school by the seventh grade where I met my new teacher, <highlight>Miss</highlight> Diana.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 七年级时，我转到了另一所学校，在那里我遇到了我的新老师，戴安娜小姐。

sense_info_list.en: fail to attend an event or activity; be absent
sense_info_list.zh: 错过; 没赶上; 缺席; 丢失

examination_example.sentence: Children over the age of 9 can't <highlight>miss</highlight> classes without permission from the school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 未经学校允许，9岁以上的孩子不能缺席。

examination_example.sentence: I must go now, or I'll <highlight>miss</highlight> my train.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我得马上走了，否则我就赶不上火车了。

examination_example.sentence: When visiting Bath, you can't <highlight>miss</highlight> these two sites.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去巴斯观光时，你不能错过这两个景点。

sense_info_list.en: feel regret or sadness at no longer being able to enjoy the presence of, do or have

examination_example.sentence: How I <highlight>miss</highlight> those sweet old days when we could just sit in the sofa!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我多么怀念我们可以窝在沙发里的甜蜜旧时光啊！

examination_example.sentence: I wondered whether they would <highlight>miss</highlight> me if I died some day．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想知道如果有一天我死了，他们是否会想念我。

examination_example.sentence: Because he <highlight>missed</highlight> his mom far in the United States.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为他想念自己远在美国的母亲。

sense_info_list.en: pass by without touching; chance not to hit

examination_example.sentence: He is in a wheelchair and is a good basketball player, but just like any kid, it upsets him when he <highlight>misses</highlight> a shot or makes a bad pass.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他坐在轮椅上，是一名优秀的篮球运动员，但就像其他孩子一样，当他投篮不中或传球失误时，他会感到沮丧。

word_usage.usage: miss和lose都有“迷失”的含义，但在lose one's way固定词组中lose不能换用成miss。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 最普通用词，侧重遗失了，难以找回来。
着重发觉某人或某物不见的瞬间，也可作思念解。
太太，夫人，是mistress的缩略形式，对已婚妇女的称呼。
女士，夫人，与gentleman相对，是对女性的礼貌称呼，多用于演讲或祝酒时称呼在场的女性。
小姐，是对未婚或不知婚姻状况的女性的称呼，与姓氏连用时应大写。
